column4: cp: cannot stat `/usr/share/doc/shorewall-common/examples/one-interface/*': No such file or directory
would you know where to find?
yes, thats where it /supposed/ to be
i can not cd in to usr
Did you say you can't cd into /usr ?
open a terminal and run this command: ls /usr/share/doc | grep shorewall
I second what Dr_Willis said, learning the command line will benefit you in the long run
you have to install a desktop or window manager first
No offense, but it sounds like  you are attempting to go from step 1 to step 9 as far as Linux goes. I feel you need to start with something more basic and work your way up as you learn.
